name: Blobs. Together. Strong.
description:
(Note: web version may lack audio, please download the pc version if the web version has issues)

You are trapped somewhere and you must escape. But you can't do it alone. Luckily, you find a few friends along the way to help you escape.

Blobs can fuse with each other to create stronger variants and you need to use this ability to escape to your homeland plains.

Remember, Blobs. Together. Strong.

Blob Alone Weak. Blobs Together Strong. You Help Blobs Escape.
Blobs Not Know What Happening. Blobs Trapped Some Place.
Blobs Fuse Together, Big Blob. Blob Seperate, Two Blobs.

Extra Details:

Submission to Brackeys Game Jam 2021.1

(Theme: Stronger Together)

Game Engine: Unity Music: Bosca Ceoil Art: Aseprite SFX: bfxr
